data.title: Charlie Sheridan on LinkedIn: TechByte: Get your Data Foundation ready for Generative AI
data.meta_description: Generative AI is the buzzword of 2023, and rightly so. Learn about the building blocks that will make your leap into AI a successful one with the Google Cloud…
data.text:
This week I had the privilege to speak at the Digital Construction Week in London, to share our thoughts on #AI deployment in the #AECO industries. To deploy AI responsibly means adding a layer to protect the creative process, I want to stress that there won’t be AI without the human behind it. While we let AI enhance our work, it is essential for us as a software provider to ensure our users’ data and creative intellectual property is protected. Thank you Alasdair Reisner for hosting the panel, and thank you Pierre Saunal, Sarah Rock, and Lee Morris for the interesting discussion and sharing your insights! Nemetschek Group #artificialintelligence #construction #AIdeployment #architect #software

I’m happy to share that I’m starting a new position as Chief Data and AI officer at Nemetschek Group! Hey everyone! I'm beyond excited to share that I'm joining the fantastic team at Nemetschek Group as Chief AI & Data Officer leading our brand-new AI Innovation Hub! AI / GenAI is a huge disrupter for AEC/O and media industries, I look forward to collaborating with my new colleagues across Nemetschek to infuse AI across our product lines, internal process while building external AI ecoysystems with technology partners and research institutes. Ethical AI, developing world leading technology & IP solutions built on strong sustainability foundations are my passions, I'm excited to collaborate with this awesome crew to make a real impact. I want to thank all my ex colleagues from Google where I had amazing 4 year journey and in this new role our paths will cross again!

In 2023, we introduced Duet AI in Google Workspace, and today, over 1 million users and thousands of organizations have experienced how it can transform their day-to-day work. To usher in the New Year, and in celebration of our customers’ success, here’s how Duet AI helped customers like Hudson River Trading, Fox Sports, Adore Me, Thoughtworks work better in 2023.

Join us at Google Cloud Gen AI Labs in Northern Virginia on February 29th for an afternoon of hands-on learning with Duet AI. Learn how you can seamlessly integrate Duet AI into your development process while having the chance to network with industry peers and experts.
